name: Vote Snowman (On One Screen)
description:
You are playing the unicode snowman, who tries to avoid negative votes and to collect positive ones.

This is my first ever LD-Entry.
Vote for my game at the game's Ludum-Dare-page!

It's nothing special and I initially planned way more (e.g. collecting votes while crawling) but that's all I was able to do in time.

The game was made using the *awesome* Love2d (or LÖVE) framework. Sound effects were generated using bfxr (http://www.bfxr.net/), the music was generated at Fake Music Generator (http://www.fakemusicgenerator.com/).

Enjoy!
